title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!

title: NAACP Image Awards: Fight Night, Cross and Percy Jackson Star Among First Two Waves of Winners
description: The first two waves of winners for the 56th NAACP Image Awards have been announced, and Peacock’s Fight Night: The Million Dollar Heist, Disney+’s Percy Jackson and the Olympians and Prime Video’s Cross were among the shows honored. Heading into this year’s awards, Ayo Edebiri was the most-nominated TV performer with four total nominations — […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: TVLine Items: Cynthia Erivo Is Tonys Host, Poker Face Sets Guest Stars and More
description: Something has changed within the Tony Awards: Wicked star Cynthia Erivo will host the 2025 ceremony, airing live from New York City’s Radio City Music Hall Sunday, June 8 at 8 pm ET/5 pm PT on CBS (and streaming on Paramount+). Ariana DeBose has emceed the awards telecast for the past three years. “I am so […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Ellen Pompeo and Natalia Grace? Not Quite, but Good American Family Scratches That Strange Itch
description: Ellen Pompeo will tackle the Natalia Grace story on Good American Family. Check out the curious first trailer and get the premiere date. The post Ellen Pompeo and Natalia Grace? Not Quite, but Good American Family Scratches That Strange Itch appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: Fire Country Season 3 Episode 12 Spoilers: Between a Rock and a Hard Place
